CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 29, 1958, pg. A1 reads: "Trial Monday - Nineteen-year-old Walter Joseph Phillips, of Bloomfield, will go on trial Monday, in Criminal Court, on a first-degree murder charge that he killed 80-year-old Green Evans, of Garfield, last summer, during a robbery in an alleyway behind the Cameraphone Theatre in East Liberty. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Man wearing dark hat with patterned band, handcuffed to murder suspect Walter Joseph Phillips, holding cigarette, walking through Court Room doorway in Allegheny County Courthouse
